quote: He had never seen her body so abandoned, so unconscious of all but the desire to be taken and satisfied. She bloomed under his caresses, no longer the girl but the woman already being born.
quote_letters: HE HAD NEVER SEEN HER BODY SO ABANDONED SO UNCONSCIOUS OF ALL BUT THE DESIRE TO BE TAKEN AND SATISFIED SHE BLOOMED UNDER HIS CARESSES NO LONGER THE GIRL BUT THE WOMAN ALREADY BEING BORN
